评论详情: The design on this shirt is eye-catching without being over the top. I appreciate the quality of the material, which is breathable and perfect for casual wear. A great addition to my weekend wardrobe.
Feels Light and comforting make the quality good. It also has the exact color it shows on the page.
Nice tee shirt. Recipient loved it
Love this tee. Very comfortable and fits great. Great distressed design and color.
"This shirt fits perfectly and feels so comfortable. I love the soft material!"

I really like the distressed look of this shirt and the style. However the graphic is pretty firm, glossy and almost plastic feeling. Prone to cracking. After several wears and washes it's peeling. So be warned if that's not your style. Even stitching and no loose threads. Overall I will definitely keep wearing. The shirt itself is really nice but not as comfortable as I'd like it to be.

评论概述: Overall, this T-shirt is a great value for the price.
评论详情: The fabric is soft and feels great against the skin, making it super comfortable to wear all day. The print quality is fantastic-vibrant and well-detailed-and it has held up well after a few washes without any signs of fading or cracking. The fit was true to size, and the shirt is versatile enough to pair with jeans or layer under a jacket for a casual look.

评论概述: Nice, bright color and nice design
评论详情: This T-shirt offers a beautiful bright color pink. The design on the front of the T-shirt is nicely done and has no bubbles and does not peel or fade after being washed. It runs true to size as well. It’s not as soft as I would’ve liked it to be, but it is definitely still manageable.
This shirt is thick and the quality is amazing. Due tot he print I did not dry it but it washed well. Comfortable and fits a bit oversized but that works for me.

This shirt is different. Its kinda cool. I like the vintage kind of faded look of the material. My only dislike is that the design printing is kind of cheap feeling. It's thin and gets folded. It seems like the kind that will crack overtime with washing and fade quicker than others. The oversized fit is nice too.
Nice and trendy t-shirt. Looks like the photos. I like the color and design. Definitely has that trendy look with a cool graphic. Fits pretty well. No complaints
Got this shirt for my boyfriend and it fit him so well. Nicely made
Unique well printed graphics. Cotton fabric is soft and the base black color has a vintage look to it. It's oversized in a good way. Well constructed, all the stitching is even and no loose threads.
this shirt is super cute and super comfortable it’s very trendy i also love the length it fits nice

First of all, this is the perfect shade of brown. I love this cool toned ashy brown. Secondly, this shirt is pretty comfortable, it’s not a full cotton tee but it’s soft and lays nicely. Lastlyc the design could be a little clearer, from far away I have no complaints but close up it’s a little blurry. Nothing too serious, it still looks really cool.

评论概述: Top Quality Graphic Tee As Promised
评论详情: I just love the graphic on this shirt and hoped it would be nice when it arrived - It Is FABULOUS and I love it! The shirt is cotton and the stitching is good, the rose colour is very pretty and has some kind of distressed wash that adds interest. The graphic is large and properly centered and not one of the rubbery feeling kind. The product size chart was accurate (I ordered it large for an oversized look and the measurements were good.) I'm very happy with the product!
This is a great edgey looking graphic tee that my teen loves. I ordered her usual size and she likes the loose fit and look. Tee is well made, super soft and washes well.

评论概述: Heat Transfer Sticks to Itself After Wash
评论详情: Overall it's a really cute y2k/streetwear option. The washed/oversize look is super in. The design stands out and is a great addition to a fit. However, you can't wash this in a regular load, the heat transfer used (artwork that's pressed on the shirt) when heated in water (I'm sure in general with too much heat), it will stick to itself and can peel the design. Thankfully though, it kind of gave it more character when that happened.
I love this T-shirt
The fabric is soft, stitching is great. Fits perfect. Grandson really likes this top tons.
This shirt has a pretty cool design. The fabric is thin and soft. It did shrink in the wash a bit.

评论概述: Perfectly Oversized and Super Comfortable – My New Go-To T-Shirt!
评论详情: This t-shirt is so cute in person and fits perfectly! It’s slightly oversized but in the best way possible—roomy and comfortable without feeling like I’m swimming in it. The color is really unique, and I’ve never owned a shirt in this shade before, but since it’s neutral, it pairs well with a lot of things I already own, which is exactly why I chose it.  The design is simple yet unique, and I love how understated it is—it’s not flashy but still makes a subtle statement. The comfort level is unbeatable; I honestly can’t get over how soft and cozy it is! This has quickly become my favorite t-shirt, and I highly recommend it, especially if you’re in need of some new casual basics like I was. You won’t regret it!

This is a thick heavy material oversized Tshirt with great graphics. Nice quality, comfortable and its true to size (oversize). As the material is thick they get hot in summer but would be ideal for fall/winter weather. Material is thick but not rough or grainy. No seam/stitch issues and no misprint. This acid washed distressed graphic tshirt has edgy/streetwear design/style and I really love it.

I got this tshirt in the women's black color and my 15 year old daughter loves it.  The material has a nice substantial weight and is of great quality.  The aged look of the fabric and nifty retro image give it a really nice stylish vibe.  It is oversized but not huge, providing a relaxed roomy fit that's part of the stylistic appeal of the shirt.  Great piece that's a win with my teen!

Size: Small This shirt has a vintage look to it and I like the colors. The graphics are a plastic glossy feel but it's not bad. The material is slightly thin but very breathable and comfortable. My complaint is that it runs a little long, it seems like it's for a more slimmer longer torso, but it's an okay shirt.
Super cute and trendy. I love the color and the shirt look exactly like the picture. It fits true to size and the length is nice
Got this for my teenage son and he loves it. It’s soft and comfortable to wear. It’s really well made
This t shirt is really comfortable. I got a size bigger for comfort. The design is really nice and I like the light distress work on the fabric. Overall satisfied. Would recommend.

This is a fun little graphic tee. It has great rock/streetwear type vibes. The graphic is applied via some sort of heat press, it seems, but based on my lengthy anecdotal experience of graphic tee-shirt ownership, I would estimate this is the quality heat press that should last a reasonable amount of time. So far, so good, at any rate. I got the pink version, which is a good washed neon pink, and looks absolutely rad. The graphic reminds me vaguely of an album cover but I can't put my finger on it, so points for being vaguely rock I suppose. I was worried about the oversized aspect because I didn't notice until after I ordered, but it's not profound. It is maybe on the baggier side of what I ordered, so order down if you want it like tight, but it's not annoyingly loose or anything. Great shirt!
